inspo_quote: Our feelings are our most genuine paths to knowledge.
author: Audre Lorde

inspo_quote: Exhale. You are doing the best you can right now.
author: Lalah Delia

inspo_quote: Instead of asking, 'What's the problem?' Ask, 'What's the creative opportunity?
author: Deepak Chopra

inspo_quote: There's no time like the present.
Where we put our awareness, and for how long, maps our destiny.
author: Joe Dispenza

inspo_quote: When you believe in yourself, you believe in possibility. You can't have one without the other.
author: Joe Dispenza

inspo_quote: Fall in love with your solitude.
author: Rupi Kaur

inspo_quote: I dwell in possibility...
author: Emily Dickinson

inspo_quote: One thing I've learned in the woods is that there is no such thing as random. Everything is steeped in meaning, colored by relationships, one thing with another.
author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

inspo_quote: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?
author: Rumi

inspo_quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
author: Rumi

inspo_quote: Our task must be to free ourselves... by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and it's beauty.
author: Albert Einstein

inspo_quote: Seize the moment. Act now.
author: Stephen Hawking

inspo_quote: Clear focus is the mind's magic wand. It points your creativity in a particular direction and channels your experience behind it. Wherever you clearly focus, you create.
author: Sonia Choquette

inspo_quote: When you breathe into fear, it becomes adventure.
author: Sonia Choquette

inspo_quote: The next message you need is always right where you are.
author: Ram Dass

inspo_quote: The past has no power over the present moment.
author: Eckhart Tolle

inspo_quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspo_quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspo_quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

inspo_quote: The soul usually knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
author: Caroline Myss

inspo_quote: This above all; to thine own self be true.
author: William Shakespeare

inspo_quote: Honest self-reflection opens your mind to reprogramming, change, success and freedom.
Can you remember who you were, before the world told you who you should be.
author: Charles Bukowski

inspo_quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

inspo_quote: Finding Nirvana is like locating silence.
author: Jack Kerouac

inspo_quote: There is a voice inside of you that whispers all day long. 'I feel this is right for me, I know that this is wrong.' No teacher, preacher, parent, friend or wise man can decide what's right for you--just listen to the voice that speaks inside.
author: Shel Silverstein

inspo_quote: We are not going in circles, we are going upwards. The path is a spiral; we have already climbed many steps.
author: Hermann Hesse

inspo_quote: ...gentleness is stronger than severity, water is stronger than rock, love is stronger than force.
author: Hermann Hesse

inspo_quote: Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at anytime and be yourself.
author: Hermann Hesse

inspo_quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched--they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

inspo_quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
author: Helen Keller

inspo_quote: When one door closes, another opens.
author: Helen Keller

inspo_quote: While they were saying among themselves it cannot be done, it was done.
author: Hermann Hesse

inspo_quote: One's destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.
author: Henry Miller

inspo_quote: To a mind that is still the whole universe surrenders.
author: Lao Tzu

inspo_quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
author: Lao Tzu

inspo_quote: Flow with whatever may happen, and let your mind be free: Stay centered by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.
author: Chuang Tzu

inspo_quote: If it's out of your hands, it deserves freedom from your mind too
author: Ivan Nuru

inspo_quote: In any moment we have two options: step forward into growth or backwards into safety.
author: Abraham Maslow

inspo_quote: Why not now?
Feel the fear and do it anyways
Show yourself how much you can depend on the person you've become
Your energy is your greatest currency
You know what to do.
Move different if you want different -- old keys never open new doors.
The medicine is inside. Go inside and get it.
author: Tepahteh 'Oso' Hutze

inspo_quote: Narrow it down. Stay on the path where your heart is on fire. Trust it. That is the door.
author: Chameli Ardagh

inspo_quote: Divine sound is the cause of all manifestation. The knower of the mystery of sound knows the mystery of the whole universe
author: Hazrat Inayat Khan
